refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: ECalBackendSync; typedef ECalBackendSyncStatus; ECalBackendSync * (*ECalBackendSyncFactoryFn) (void); void e_cal_backend_sync_set_lock (ECalBackendSync *backend, gboolean lock); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_is_read_only (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gboolean *read_only); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_cal_address (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gchar **address); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_alarm_email_address (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gchar **address); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_ldap_attribute (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gchar **attribute); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_static_capabilities (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gchar **capabiliites); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_open (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gboolean only_if_exists, const gchar *username, const gchar *password); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_remove (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_create_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gchar **calobj, gchar **uid); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_modify_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *calobj, CalObjModType mod, gchar **old_object, gchar **new_object); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_remove_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *rid, CalObjModType mod, gchar **old_object, gchar **object); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_attachment_list (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *rid, GSList **attachments); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_discard_alarm (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *auid); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_receive_objects (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *calobj); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_send_objects (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *calobj, GList **users, gchar **modified_calobj); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_default_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gchar **object); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *rid, gchar **object); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_object_list (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *sexp, GList **objects); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_timezone (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *tzid, gchar **object); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_add_timezone (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *tzobj); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_set_default_timezone (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *tzid); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_set_default_zone (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *tzobj); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_changes (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *change_id, GList **adds, GList **modifies, GList **deletes); ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_free_busy (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, GList *users, time_t start, time_t end, GList **freebusy);

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_set_lock ()
refsect2.para: Sets the lock mode on the ECalBackendSync object. If TRUE, the backend will create a locking mutex for every operation, so that only one can happen at a time. If FALSE, no lock would be done and many operations can happen at the same time.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_is_read_only ()
refsect2.para: Calls the is_read_only method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_cal_address ()
refsect2.para: Calls the get_cal_address method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_alarm_email_address ()
refsect2.para: Calls the get_alarm_email_address method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_ldap_attribute ()
refsect2.para: Calls the get_ldap_attribute method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_static_capabilities ()
refsect2.para: Calls the get_capabilities method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_open ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_open (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, gboolean only_if_exists, const gchar *username, const gchar *password);
refsect2.para: Calls the open method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: Whether to open the calendar if and only if it already exists or just create it when it does not exist.
User name to use for authentication.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_remove ()
refsect2.para: Calls the remove method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_create_object ()
refsect2.para: Calls the create_object method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_modify_object ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_modify_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *calobj, CalObjModType mod, gchar **old_object, gchar **new_object);
refsect2.para: Calls the modify_object method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: Type of modification to be done.
Placeholder for returning the old object as it was stored on the backend.
Placeholder for returning the new object as it has been stored on the backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_remove_object ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_remove_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *rid, CalObjModType mod, gchar **old_object, gchar **object);
refsect2.para: Calls the remove_object method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: UID of the object to remove.
Recurrence ID of the instance to remove, or NULL if removing the whole object.
Placeholder for returning the old object as it was stored on the backend.
Placeholder for returning the object after it has been modified (when removing individual instances). If removing the whole object, this will be NULL.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_attachment_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_attachment_list (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *rid, GSList **attachments);
refsect2.para: Calls the get_attachment_list method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: Unique id of the calendar object.
Recurrence id of the calendar object.
Placeholder for list of returned attachment uris.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_discard_alarm ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_discard_alarm (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *auid);
refsect2.para: Calls the discard_alarm method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: UID of the object to discard the alarm from.
UID of the alarm to be discarded.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_receive_objects ()
refsect2.para: Calls the receive_objects method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_send_objects ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_send_objects (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *calobj, GList **users, gchar **modified_calobj);
refsect2.para: Calls the send_objects method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: List of users to send notifications to.
Placeholder for the iCalendar object after being modified.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_default_object ()
refsect2.para: Calls the get_default_object method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_object ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_object (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *uid, const gchar *rid, gchar **object);
refsect2.para: Calls the get_object method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: UID of the object to get.
Recurrence ID of the specific instance to get, or NULL if getting the master object.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_object_list ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_object_list (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *sexp, GList **objects);
refsect2.para: Calls the get_object_list method on the given backend.

refsect2.para: Calls the get_timezone method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: ID of the timezone to retrieve.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_add_timezone ()
refsect2.para: Calls the add_timezone method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_set_default_timezone ()
refsect2.para: Calls the set_default_timezone method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: ID of the timezone to be set as default.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_set_default_zone ()
refsect2.para: Calls the set_default_timezone method on the given backend.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_changes ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_changes (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, const gchar *change_id, GList **adds, GList **modifies, GList **deletes);

listitem.simpara: ID of the change to use as base.

refsect2.title: e_cal_backend_sync_get_free_busy ()
refsect2.programlisting: ECalBackendSyncStatus e_cal_backend_sync_get_free_busy (ECalBackendSync *backend, EDataCal *cal, GList *users, time_t start, time_t end, GList **freebusy);
refsect2.para: Calls the get_free_busy method on the given backend.

listitem.simpara: List of users to get F/B info from.
